bill.summary:
Recovery Home Certification Act of 2018
This bill requires the Center for Substance Abuse Treatment and Recovery to establish model criteria for recovery homes and award grants to states that establish and operate recovery homes based on such model criteria.
The bill also makes it unlawful to make or receive payments for referrals to recovery homes or clinical treatment facilities.
